Node.definition: = title used to address a person (male if in singular) who is regarded with some degree of affection, ◄ as if he were the speaker's child
= marker indicating that the event in focus has to be true before another event can take place
= words spoken by humans and deities; often remembered and recorded
literally: to store up events in one's mind; hence: = to experience affection for an event
particle linking two entities and denoting that X and Y function as one single entity in the proposition in focus
= action by which humans or deities pay close attention in order to be able to hear what (other) humans might be saying, or to pick up other sounds and react to if needed
= state in which humans, deities or animals have a certain level of wisdom, intelligence, or proficiency
= one of two parts of the body of humans and animals that is used for hearing; also a common place to wear jewelry

Node.gloss: to turn (one's) heart (in a certain direction)|to focus (one's) attention
Node.definition: literally: to turn (one's) heart (in a certain direction); hence: = action by which humans focus their thoughts and attention on a person, deity, or activity
literally: heart; hence: = the seat of knowledge, human reasoning, planning, intelligence, skill, affection and hatred, desire and satisfaction, humility and pride, courage and fear, joy and grief
= state whereby someone has the ability to see through the outward appearance of things and grasp their essence
= marker indicating that the event in focus has to be true before another event can take place
= state whereby someone has the ability to see through the outward appearance of things and grasp their essence
literally: to cry out; hence: = causative action by which humans or deities let (other) humans know that they are to come, either by approaching them directly or sending a message
= state whereby someone has the ability to see through the outward appearance of things and grasp their essence
= marker indicating that the event in focus has to be true before another event can take place
= state in which humans experience the desire to attain a certain status or condition and do what is needed to make this a reality
= silver, usually in the form of small unstamped pieces that had to be weighed in order to determine their value; after the exile, people in Israel started using coins
= objects of value that are usually kept invisible from others to keep them safe
= action by which humans =make an effort to obtain a particular quality
= referent pointing to a specific condition or circumstance

Node.gloss: to consider|to pay heed|to perceive|to realize|to understand|to distinguish
Node.definition: = process by which someone gains knowledge and understanding by observing carefully in order to see through the outward appearance of things and grasp their essence
= state in which humans experience fear
= deity; ► God of Israel who revealed himself to Moses
literally: knowing (God); hence: = action by which humans, either as individuals or as groups, assume a position of subservience towards a deity
plural with singular meaning: = the highest God, creator of heaven and earth
literally: to find (in someone); hence: = process by which humans come upon certain information
= deity; ► God of Israel who revealed himself to Moses
= state in which humans, deities or animals have a certain level of wisdom, intelligence, or proficiency
= an opening in the lower part of the face of humans and animals through which food and air are taken and vocal sounds are emitted
literally: knowing; hence: = a collection of information stored and processed in someone's mind that gives that person the ability to analyse, discern, make decisions and act accordingly
= state whereby someone has the ability to see through the outward appearance of things and grasp their essence
literally: to store up events in one's mind; hence: = action by which deities decide in their minds to carry out a certain event in the future
= person whose behavior is morally and ethically right

= a flat, usually round, object; made of wood or metal; ► used in battle; held by a warrior in front of him as protection from the weapons of his opponent; relatively small and easy to maneuver; ≈ associated with protection and therefore often used as an epithet for God
= process by which humans or deities follow a certain pattern of behavior, ◄ which is described as their journey through life

Node.gloss: to watch over|to guard|to be in charge of|to take care of|to protect|to tend|to keep
Node.definition: = causative action by which humans or deities make sure that an object is safe from harm; ◄ by observing the object and the surrounding area carefully and intervening when necessary
= a pattern of behavior, with a primary focus on moral and ethical behavior, ◄ understood as a journey through life
= practices that conform to the laws of God
literally: road; hence: = pattern of behavior, with a primary focus on moral and ethical behavior, ◄ understood as a journey through life

= someone who practices חֶסֶד, who is committed towards fulfilling his/her obligations; these may be obligations defined within the context of a covenant or agreement, or moral obligations to do well to someone who did well to you before

Node.gloss: to watch over|to guard|to be in charge of|to take care of|to protect|to tend|to keep
Node.definition: = causative action by which humans or deities make sure that an object is safe from harm; ◄ by observing the object and the surrounding area carefully and intervening when necessary
= referent pointing to a specific condition or circumstance

Node.gloss: to consider|to pay heed|to perceive|to realize|to understand|to distinguish
Node.definition: = process by which someone gains knowledge and understanding by observing carefully in order to see through the outward appearance of things and grasp their essence

= pattern of behavior of humans or deities that is in accordance to the requirements of the divine law and generally aimed at establishing or restoring this pattern as a standard, which in certain cases requires a victory over evil and results in prosperity and happiness
= practices that conform to the laws of God
literally: smoothness; hence: = state in which an event is morally and ethically right
= pattern of behavior, with a primary focus on moral and ethical behavior, ◄ understood as a journey through life
= state in which events are well performed, morally and ethically correct, and beneficial to others
= state in which humans, deities or animals have a certain level of wisdom, intelligence, or proficiency
literally: heart; hence: = the seat of knowledge, human reasoning, planning, intelligence, skill, affection and hatred, desire and satisfaction, humility and pride, courage and fear, joy and grief
literally: knowing; hence: = a collection of information stored and processed in someone's mind that gives that person the ability to analyse, discern, make decisions and act accordingly

literally: throat, as the part of the body that contains the passage ways for blood, air, and food; hence: = the life principle that animates both humans and animals, turns them into breathing living beings, and functions as the center of their personality, mind, physical and non physical desires, courage, emotions, and affections; it is believed to reside in the blood
= state in which conditions and circumstances have qualities that inspire appreciation
= human power or ability to devise a plan or strategy to accomplish a certain goal

Node.gloss: to watch over|to guard|to be in charge of|to take care of|to protect|to tend|to keep
Node.definition: = causative action by which humans or deities make sure that an object is safe from harm; ◄ by observing the object and the surrounding area carefully and intervening when necessary
= state whereby someone has the ability to see through the outward appearance of things and grasp their essence

Node.gloss: to watch over|to guard|to be in charge of|to take care of|to protect|to tend|to keep
Node.definition: = causative action by which humans or deities make sure that an object is safe from harm; ◄ by observing the object and the surrounding area carefully and intervening when necessary
= causative action by which humans or deities remove (other) humans or objects from a dangerous or life threatening situation
literally: road; hence: = pattern of behavior, with a primary focus on moral and ethical behavior, ◄ understood as a journey through life
= state in which an event is morally and/or ethically wrong

= action by which humans and deities utter words; this can happen within their minds and be inaudible to others, but in most cases the words are spoken out loud in order to communicate something to others; usually not directly followed by the actual words that are spoken
= action by which humans or deities suspend their commitment to a certain pattern of behavior
= a pattern of behavior, with a primary focus on moral and ethical behavior, ◄ understood as a journey through life
= state in which humans are morally and ethically right
= process by which humans or deities follow a certain pattern of behavior, ◄ which is described as their journey through life
literally: road; hence: = pattern of behavior, with a primary focus on moral and ethical behavior, ◄ understood as a journey through life

= state in which there is no light, ◄ caused by the fact that the light of sun, moon, and stars cannot reach the location that is in focus, ► resulting in a state in which no one can readily see, and colors and shapes can no longer be distinguished; loved by the wicked only; ≈ associated with hardship, ignorance, death, and oblivion
= state in which humans feel and show great joy

Node.gloss: to do|to perform|to commit|to practice|to observe|to celebrate|to keep
Node.definition: = action by which humans or deities engage in a particular action
= state in which an event is morally and/or ethically wrong
mainly in poetical texts: = state in which humans feel and show great joy
= state in which an event is morally and/or ethically wrong
= a linker introducing a proposition that gives additional information regarding an explicit or implicit object, location, time, or manner
= a pattern of behavior, with a primary focus on moral and ethical behavior, ◄ understood as a journey through life
literally: to be crooked (of an event); hence: = state in which an event is considered morally and/or ethically unacceptable
= pattern of behavior, with a primary focus on moral and ethical behavior, ◄ understood as a journey through life
= causative action by which humans or deities remove (other) humans or objects from a dangerous or life threatening situation
= woman of marriagable age or older, whether married or not
literally: outsider (woman); = a woman who is the wife of someone else
literally: foreign woman; = a woman who is the wife of someone else
= words spoken by humans and deities; often remembered and recorded

Node.gloss: to cause to flatter|to make deceitful
Node.definition: literally: to make smooth; hence: = causative action by which humans cause events to appear well intentioned, though actually being insincere
= action by which animals, humans, or deities suspend their commitment to (other) objects, animals, humans, or deities, either temporarily or permanently
= person, male or female, with whom one has a special bond, such as friendship, marriage, a covenant, etc., ≈ usually regarded with affection and seen as trustworthy
= the period of a person's life between childhood and adulthood

marker identifying the entity that is directly targeted by the event in focus, and which usually is already part of the cognitive context; described in syntactic terms as the direct object marker; untranslatable in English unless accompanied by a suffix
= a solemn agreement between two or more parties (persons, groups, nations, deities) with stipulations, blessings, and curses
plural with singular meaning: = generic term for a supernatural being, worshiped by individuals or entire nations
= process by which an object gradually sinks down to a lower level; ≈ associated with deterioration
= abode of the dead; ≈ considered to be a remote place, deep in the earth, with power over humankind, without remembrance, without praising God

= construction surrounded by walls and covered with a roof; ◄ normally made of stones, wood, or clay; ► to be used as living quarters, for storage, as a prison, as a sanctuary, etc.; sometimes used to denote a smaller part of a large construction
= pattern of behavior, with a primary focus on moral and ethical behavior, ◄ understood as a journey through life
literally: to turn; hence: = action by which animals, humans, or deities move back to a location where they have been before
literally: to catch up with a path; hence: = process by which humans reengage with a particular activity
= a pattern of behavior, with a primary focus on moral and ethical behavior, ◄ understood as a journey through life

= the state of being alive and well; ◄ because of the presence of air to breathe and food to eat; ≈ life is regarded as more than a mere physical condition; in many cases it includes health, strength, and some degree of prosperity
= process by which humans or deities follow a certain pattern of behavior, ◄ which is described as their journey through life
literally: road; hence: = pattern of behavior, with a primary focus on moral and ethical behavior, ◄ understood as a journey through life
= state in which events are well performed, morally and ethically correct, and beneficial to others
= a pattern of behavior, with a primary focus on moral and ethical behavior, ◄ understood as a journey through life
= state in which a person's or deity's behavior is fully consistent with the requirements of the law, either in a specific matter that is under dispute or as one's general mode of behavior
= action by which humans or deities act in accordance with a certain (usually) prescribed pattern of behavior, such as a law, covenant, etc.
= person whose behavior is morally and ethically right

= the earth as opposed to the sky; sometimes used in a more specific sense to denote part of the earth, such as the dry land as opposed to the sea, or a specific region, area, country, or plot of land

= the earth as opposed to the sky; sometimes used in a more specific sense to denote part of the earth, such as the dry land as opposed to the sea, or a specific region, area, country, or plot of land

Node.gloss: to be cut off|to be lacking
Node.definition: literally: to be cut off; hence: = process by which a certain category of people stops existing within a particular group

Node.gloss: to act unfaithfully|to be treacherous|to deal treacherously|to break faith|to betray
Node.definition: = pattern of behavior by which humans act in a way which shows a lack of truthfulness and commitment, both in words and deeds
